PASS Verify convertToBlob on a 0 width OffscreenCanvas with no context. 
PASS Verify convertToBlob and getImageData on a 0 width OffscreenCanvas with a 2d context. 
PASS Verify convertToBlob on a 0 width OffscreenCanvas with a webgl context. 
PASS Verify convertToBlob on a 0 width OffscreenCanvas with a webgl2 context. 
PASS Verify convertToBlob on a 0 height OffscreenCanvas with no context. 
PASS Verify convertToBlob and getImageData on a 0 height OffscreenCanvas with a 2d context. 
PASS Verify convertToBlob on a 0 height OffscreenCanvas with a webgl context. 
PASS Verify convertToBlob on a 0 height OffscreenCanvas with a webgl2 context.
